R-Series

DDcontrol > R-Series

Ruggedized R-Series

The R-Series line of enclosures enables the rapid deployment of IT infrastructure into any environment imaginable, while providing secure, clean-room quality data center conditions, which can support any rack mountable hardware.
Talk to us

Edge Deployments

When environmental conditions are not conducive for IT equipment, R-Series enclosures deliver turnkey data center capabilities, on-demand!

Mobile Data Centers

Providing rack space, cooling, fire suppression, security, monitoring, and management all in a succinct, modular package.

Variety of Configurations

On location, on a temporary basis, or if the requirement is for permanent infrastructure where data center resources do not exist.

Removes Obstacles

Supporting any rack mountable hardware, rapidly deploy anywhere the demand exists.

Ruggedized R-Series

When mobility is key, the R-Series line of enclosures delivers data center capabilities anywhere the demand exists. With integrated DX cooling, fire suppression, and security, combined within a 100% self-contained and mobile package, IT infrastructure can be deployed in minutes, in any environmental condition imaginable.

Select the correct RU (rack unit) size for your needs, choose rolling casters or pallet jack mounting for easy-mobility, and you have your own data center on wheels, all you supply is power!

  • R-1012
  • R-1024
  • R-1030
  • R-1042

R-1012

  • Density Capability
    293W-1.75kW
  • Rack Units
    12U
  • Measurements (HxWxD)
    32.5 X 25.5 X 55 (in)
    82.5 x 65 x 140 (cm)
  • Max Equipment Depth
    32 (in) 81.3 (in)
  • Unit Weight
    310 (lbs) 141 (kg)
  • NEMA Rating
    NEMA4 (4x option)
  • Controls
    Automated Cooling/HVAC Control
  • Fire Suppression/Risk Management
    Integrated, Inert Gas Based
  • Cabinet Power Distribution
    Optional
  • Power Management
    Optional based on location
  • Cooling System
    Dx Air Conditioning
  • Water Temp Operating Range
    NA
  • Flow Rate
    NA
  • Air Flow
    175-350 CFM
    (297-594 m3/h)
  • Inter-Cabinet Cable Mgmt.
    Optional
  • Security Options
    Locks/Biometrics/2FA
View Spec Sheet
